LangInfo: Здесь видны все ваши устройства, скачать прошивки для ESP8266 вы можете на github: Жалюзи, RGB, Sonoff. Если появились какие-то вопросы, пишите сюда: Жалюзи, RGB, Sonoff.
LangSearch2: If you have multiple devices connected to a network, you can add it here by clicking below:
LangOptions2: Change the configuration of the device, you can Options page,
LangSetting4:
Open Developer settings
Carefully, ill-considered actions could damage the device.
LangSetting5:
By clicking here you can change the html, css, js files of the project
Just below you can download the new firmware (*.bin file):
LangWiFi3: Please connect to your router and enter your GMT time zone. It enables you to control your device on the local network and to synchronize the time using your router.
LangWiFi4: After the device is connected to the router, WiFi will disappear.
LangGMT2: Auto search and save GMT zone
LangDDNS2: At 15th, 30th, 45th minutes every hour the device switched to the link. You can use dyndns.dk and this make a domain on a dynamic IP. That will allow comfortable use ifttt.com
LangReset2: Changes will take effect after a reboot. Please reboot your device.
LangReset3: Are you sure you want to reboot the device?
LangTime6: Attention. By adjusting the time write "0" before a single digit. Example: 03:09:10. Alarm Clock repeated calls every day.
LangIfttt1: With service ifttt.com device can be switched in many scenarios, such as: new message on facebook, twitter, more ...
LangIfttt2:
setting in Google calendar, mail, etc. More information how to do this, you can see in the video here
Local link: Select the color
Global link: Select the color
LangTime7: This specifies the time in seconds how long will ring alarm clock and lit LED.
LangIfttt3: More options can be found at ifttt.com.
